          <title>
            <string language="hu">A szomszéd országok nemzeti igényei Magyarországgal szemben</string>
            <string language="en">National needs of neighbour countries again Hungary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nationale Notwendigkeiten der Nachbarländer 
wieder Ungarn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les besoins nationaux des pays voisins encore 
Hongrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Necessidades nacionais de países vizinhos outra 
vez Hungria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bisogni nazionali di vicini a paesi ancora 
Ungheria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνικές ανάγκες των κοντινών χωρών πάλι Ουγγαρία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Necesidades nacionales de los países vecinos otra 
vez Hungría</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A területi igények bemutatása egyenként és együttesen is</string>
            <string language="en">Introducing of the territorial claim apiece and jointly</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">területi követelések,  Trianon,  nacionalizmus,  </string>
            <string language="en">territorial claim, Trianon, nationalism,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einführen des territorialen Anspruches pro 
stück und gemeinsam</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de la réclamation territoriale la 
pièce et conjointement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introduzir da reivindicação territorial cada e 
conjuntamente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione del reclamo territoriale per uno ed 
insieme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή της εδαφικής αξίωσης ανά τεμάχιο και από 
κοινού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El introducir de la demanda territorial cada uno y 
en común</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">territorialer Anspruch, Trianon, Nationalismus,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réclamation territoriale, Trianon, nationalisme,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reivindicação territorial, Trianon, nationalism,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reclamo territoriale, Trianon, nazionalismo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εδαφική αξίωση, Trianon, εθνικισμός,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">demanda territorial, Trianon, nacionalismo,</string>
          </keyword>
